title: PM asks Muslims to care for environment
content:
In a tweet on social media platform Twitter, he said, “Almost 1500 years ago our Prophet PBUH emphasised that our actions on this earth must consider their impact on our future generations. So farsighted. Hazrat Ali AS emphasised the same. We Muslims should have been the leading environmentalists caring for our future generations.”
